stepAnswer: The potential outlier flattened the slope of the line of best fit because it was below the data set. It made the line of best fit less accurate as a predictor for the data.
stepBody: What effect did the potential outlier have on the line of best fit?
choices: The potential outlier increased the slope of the line of the best fit, making the line more accurate
The potential outlier flattened the slope of the line of best fit because it was below the data set. It made the line of best fit less accurate as a predictor for the data.
The potential outlier had no effect on the line of best fit, because the line of best fit is independent of the correlation coefficient.
